co.cask.cdap.api.messaging.MessagingException

  • Packages that use MessagingException 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.messaging
    This package contains classes and interfaces for interacting with the Transactional Messaging System.

    • Uses of MessagingException in co.cask.cdap.api.messaging

      Subclasses of MessagingException in co.cask.cdap.api.messaging 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TopicAlreadyExistsException
      Exception thrown when trying to create a topic while the topic of that name already exists.
      class  TopicNotFoundException
      Exception thrown when trying to operation on a topic while the topic of that name does not exists.
